akas: Dyqani i vogël i kafshëve Albania
akas from release info: Dyqani i vogël i kafshëve Albania

1.title: The Tortoise and the Heir
1.plot: While Blythe ponders her life's calling, a 150 year-old giant tortoise with an interesting past comes to the day camp and shares some life-changing information with her.

2.title: Pitch Purrfect
2.plot: Zoe enlists the pets to form a singing group to compete in the Alley Cappella championships while Blythe is too distracted by her mother's journal to help search for Mrs. Twombly's missing doorknobs.

3.title: Ivan the Terrific
3.plot: Blythe helps Youngmee in her search for the perfect pet while the LPS pets in the day camp must deal with a wayward circus bear.

4.title: Senior Day
4.plot: Russell agrees to let his father Jerry move in with him and Blythe befriends an elderly woman who is eager to have Blythe meet her kindhearted granddaughters.

5.title: Littlest Pet Shop of Horrors
5.plot: Blythe and the gang have a scary story-telling contest, while a severely jet-lagged Roger thinks he's living an actual nightmare as he desperately tries to make it home.

6.title: Game of Groans
6.plot: Russell's dream comes true when Blythe takes him, Vinnie and Sunil to the Renaissance Faire in Downtown City Park, but he soon discovers trouble is afoot when an old friend informs him of nefarious activity at the fair.

7.title: The Tiniest Animal Store
7.plot: A TV producer creates a sitcom based on the Littlest Pet Shop, but Blythe worries it will reveal her secret.

8.title: Spendthrifty
8.plot: Blythe gets a second job as a sales clerk at the Thrifty Armoire and struggles to keep her spending under control while the pets are driven bonkers by a demanding doll that Blythe has left in their care.

9.title: Un-Vetted
9.plot: Zoe develops a crush on the new veterinarian's German Shepard, while Blythe and Russell spend the night camping on a freezing mountain.

10.title: Pump Up the Panda
10.plot: It's fun at the beach where Blythe debuts her new pet beachwear line, while Penny Ling meets a lobster eager to "get her in shape" and Sunil and Vinnie face off in an intense sandcastle-building contest.

11.title: Snipmates
11.plot: Blythe faces off against the hyper-competitive McKenna on a fashion reality show, while back at Littlest Pet Shop the gang tries to figure out why Sugar Sprinkles is so out of sorts.

12.title: Guilt Tripping
12.plot: Blythe is wracked with guilt when her temporary lapse in judgment gets the Biskits suspended from school while Pepper is on pins and needles awaiting Vinnie's punishment for breaking his lucky rock.

13.title: Petnapped!
13.plot: Youngmee and Blythe try to save a cocker spaniel from her impostor owner, while the pets try to reenact an episode of Russell's favorite TV show.

14.title: Steamed
14.plot: Blythe helps Mrs. Twombly prepare her new coffee shop for its grand opening.

15.title: Two Peas in a Podcast
15.plot: The Biskits try to recreate Blythe's vlogcasting success by doing one of their own, while the pets think Penny Ling is going to be moving away.

16.title: Go Figure!
16.plot: Things get complicated when Sunil and Vinnie get lost at a sci-fi convention while Minka tries to go Zen with help from a new day camper.

17.title: A Leah Rose by Another Name
17.plot: Blythe try's to figure out why mrs biskit's dog doesn't want to compete in a local dog show meanwhile wiggles the alligator returns to the day camp trying to help the pets.

18.title: It's a Happy, Happy, Happy, Happy World
18.plot: Blythe and Zoe help Mrs. Biskit train her new pooch for the purebred dog show, while the rest of the pets deal with the return of Wiggles McSunbask.

19.title: Race Team: Buttercream
19.plot: At the Bunny Races, Buttercream changes personality and becomes a speed demon, then switches back and loses a race, and Blythe's smartphone, in the process..

20.title: On the Same Page
20.plot: Blythe's afraid she may lose the ability to communicate with the pets while the pets have let a petty argument keep them from communicating altogether.

21.title: Paint a Picture, It'll Last Longer
21.plot: When Minka paints in a new style that everyone loves except her, she makes Blythe promise to keep her name a secret, which she does... by taking credit for it.

22.title: Bake It 'Til You Make It
22.plot: Blythe enlists her famous cousin to help boost Sweet Delights sales while Sunil needs the pets, help to convince his parents that he's a doctor.

23.title: Seeing Red
23.plot: Penny Ling is intrigued by a red panda who comes to the day camp and Blythe writes a short story based on her parents as teens.

24.title: Littlest Pet Street: Part 1
24.plot: Blythe gets viral video star Felina Meow to appear at Littlest Pet Street's Grand Opening, but she and the pets have to fly to her island home to pick her up.

25.title: Littlest Pet Street: Part 2
25.plot: Blythe, Roger and the pets are trying to get off the island, while Mrs. Twombly is desperate to get everything ready for the Grand Opening of Littlest Pet Street.

26.title: LPS: The Moosical
26.plot: It's a musical disaster when Blythe and the Pets try to calm a nervous Moose whose incessant bellowing threaten to spoil Mrs. Twombly's big singing quartet reunion.

1.title: Blythe's Big Adventure Part One
1.plot: Blythe Baxter moves to the big city above the Littlest Pet Shop. She finds out she can talk to the pets in the shop and must save the shop from closing and turning into a sweet shop.

2.title: Blythe's Big Adventure Part Two
2.plot: In order to save the pet shop from closing, Blythe hosts a fashion show for the pets.

3.title: Bad Hair Day
3.plot: Blythe makes a bad mistake while cutting Zoe's hair. Meanwhile, the pets urge Minka to pursue fame with her art.

4.title: Gailbreak!
4.plot: Zoe sees her sister locked inside Largest Ever Pet Shop, and enlists Blythe's and the rest of the pets' help to retrieve her.

5.title: Penny for Your Laughs
5.plot: Pepper is unaware that her new stand-up comedy show routine might be offending the other pets; meanwhile, Blythe is persuaded to become friends with the Biskit twins.

6.title: Mean Isn't Your Color
6.plot: Blythe has a hard time accepting that her dad has a date while Penny struggles with admitting she does not like the outfit Blythe is making for her.

7.title: Russell Up Some Fun
7.plot: Russell creates his alter ego and dons a wild Hawaiian shirt, Blythe helps Sue through her own identity after she starts imitating Blythe's style.

8.title: Blythe's Crush
8.plot: Blythe and Zoe try to return a set of keys to Bylthe's new crush, the remaining pets team up with a parrot who claims he is a legendary hero.

9.title: Dumb Dumbwaiter
9.plot: Penny Ling leads the other pets on a mission to free Blythe, Zoe, Pepper and Minka when they get trapped in the dumbwaiter.

10.title: Eve of Destruction
10.plot: While Mrs. Twombly is away, Blythe is left to manage the shop and keep peace between Zoe and Madame Pom.

11.title: Books and Covers
11.plot: The pets suspect a Siamese cat is a spy and Blythe fills the spots on her Mathlete team with the Biskit twins in order to compete in a match.

12.title: So You Skink You Can Dance
12.plot: Blythe and her dad take a trip to Hollywood with Vinnie in tow. The camera-shy Blythe is mistaken for a substitute dancer during a set visit to Vinnie's favorite dance show, and Vinnie gets his groove back from a local dance crew.

13.title: Lights, Camera, Mongoose!
13.plot: Famous movie star mongoose Shahrukh is in town shooting his next film and the pets go on set to visit their favorite star, but when Sunil is mistaken for Shahrukh, he's in for some excitement.

14.title: Trading Places
14.plot: Zoe asks for Penny Ling to share her feelings about a pet shop camper named Digby. Meanwhile, Russell hides inside Blythe's backpack and gets lost at her school.

15.title: Topped with Buttercream
15.plot: The pets fill up on one too many treats when they're stuck in the sweet shoppe's pantry with Aunt Christie's pet rabbit, Buttercream.

16.title: Sweet (Truck) Ride
16.plot: Blythe rescues the pets when they accidentally send a truck careening down the street, but when Blythe gets blamed, the pets decide to film a reenactment.

17.title: Helicopter Dad
17.plot: Wanting to spend the day together, Blythe's dad surprises her at school; Minka makes friends with an antisocial tortoise.

18.title: What's in the Batter?
18.plot: Blythe loses her necklace in some cupcake batter while helping Youngmee fill a cupcake order.

19.title: What Did You Say?
19.plot: When Vinnie falls into a garbage can and is accidentally transported to the city dump the pets ask Blythe for her help, only to discover she can no longer understand them.

20.title: Bakers and Fakers
20.plot: The pets try to retrieve a recipe stolen from Blythe by the Biskits, who plan to use it for a baking competition hosted at Blythe's school. Meanwhile, Vinnie has a vision of cakes occupying the world.

21.title: Terriers and Tiaras
21.plot: Blythe agrees to appear on a reality pet pageant show, but she is finds out that the competition brings out the worst in people.

22.title: Lotsa Luck
22.plot: Pepper tries to earn the approval of her comedy idol when he visits, while Blythe discovers Mrs. Twombly's secret past.

23.title: Door-Jammed
23.plot: Blythe gets locked in a bathroom with Whittany Biskit, while back at the pet shop, the pets hear odd howling and try to find the "werewolf" among them.

24.title: Frenemies
24.plot: Vinnie loses his tail and is surprised when it makes him a better dancer. Zoe and Pepper get competitive in planning a party.

25.title: Blythe's Pet Project
25.plot: When Mrs. Twombly loses her glasses, Blythe meets Shivers, a squirrel who has a problem with hoarding.

26.title: Summertime Blues
26.plot: Blythe is accepted into the junior program at a fashion school, and has to face the difficulty of saying goodbye to her friends for the summer.

1.title: Missing Blythe
1.plot: A few months pass since Blythe leaves for her summer junior program. Aching to see her in person again, the pets at Littlest Pet Shop come up with a plan to visit Blythe while she is away at fashion camp for the summer.

2.title: The Nest Hats Craze!
2.plot: Blythe accidentally starts a new fashion craze when a bird's nest fall on her head, and she struggles to return it while the Biskit twins take advantage of her popularity.

3.title: Eight Arms to Hold You
3.plot: Sunil and Vinnie want to join in on Russell's first slumber party, but a mysterious unseen wet monster fuels Russell's fear of ghosts.

4.title: Heart of Parkness
4.plot: Sunil contemplates enthroning himself as king over the raccoon population of City Park after rescuing them from a vicious cobra.

5.title: Pawlm Reading
5.plot: A self-proclaimed pet psychic shows up at Littlest Pet Shop, but Blythe begins to think that she may be fraud after she incorrectly reads the LPS pets.

6.title: The Treasure of Henrietta Twombly
6.plot: The history of Littlest Pet Shop is uncovered when Mrs. Twombly is informed of buried treasure located beneath the lot.

7.title: What, Meme Worry?
7.plot: A picture of Sunil becomes an internet meme, which annoys Zoe, who would rather have the fame for herself. The Biskit twins see this and attempt to make their own viral hit with a music video.

8.title: The Big Feathered Parade
8.plot: When Blythe discovers her costume designs for parade have been stolen by another designer, she enlists her pet pals to help her prove the work is hers while Vinnie tries to please his idol, Bruce, this year's parade grand marshal.

9.title: A Day at the Museum
9.plot: The pets get lost in the Museum of Natural History and Science, and Blythe has to find them before they're caught.

10.title: Alligators and Handbags
10.plot: Blythe tries to regain her confidence after a critique session with a famously intimidating fashion editor, while the pets contend with a bully alligator in the day camp.

11.title: Blythe's Big Idea
11.plot: Blythe needs to get a sales kiosk so she can enter the International Pet Fashion Expo. Meanwhile, Roger's airline launches a "Pet Jet" service, with the pets using it to launch one of their largest fantasies yet.

12.title: Commercial Success
12.plot: Slow business prompts Mrs. Twombly to shoot a commercial for Littlest Pet Shop. But when Jasper is given the job of director, the fame quickly goes to his head.

13.title: So Interesting
13.plot: When Penny Ling feels left out when the other pets share their most interesting stories, she creates a fantastic tale about her saving a valley from an evil crab witch.

14.title: To Paris with Zoe
14.plot: Blythe takes Zoe to Paris to compete in a dog show, but a handsome street performer distracts Zoe from the competition. Back at the shop, the pets struggle to get Vinnie to change the channel so they can watch the competition on TV.

15.title: Super Sunil
15.plot: Penny attempts to convince Sunil he has superpowers while Blythe and Russell attempt to beat the Bizkit twins to a parking spot for the Sweet Delights truck.

16.title: Sweet Pepper
16.plot: Pepper develops a crush on a cute new polecat visiting the pet shop.

17.title: Shanghai Hi-Jinks
17.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

18.title: Grounded
18.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

19.title: Inside Job
19.plot: Blythe runs for class president against the biskit twins.

20.title: Plane It on Rio!
20.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

21.title: Littlest Bigfoot
21.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

22.title: Sunil's Sick Day
22.plot: Sunil feigns illness in order to avoid Vinnie, with whom he has a feud.

23.title: The Hedgehog in the Plastic Bubble
23.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

24.title: Stand Up Stinker
24.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

25.title: The Expo Factor - Part 1
25.plot: Blythe is really nervous about the pet expo and has to choose only one pet meanwhile a new day camper delhia shows then what the expo is about.

26.title: The Expo Factor - Part 2
26.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

1.title: Sleeper
1.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

2.title: War of the Weirds
2.plot: The pets thinks there is an alien at big city when Vinnie and Sunil sees a UFO at downtown city.

3.title: Some Assistance Required
3.plot: Blythe fills in for Mona Autumn's secretary, but has difficulty managing everything. Meanwhile, Russell and Zoe have a troublesome photo shoot.

4.title: Secret Cupet
4.plot: A secret cupid is going around spreading love, and Russell is determined to catch them.

5.title: Hamster Hoods
5.plot: When stolen merchandise from Largest Ever Pet Shop mysteriously ends up in Blythe's dumbwaiter, the search for the culprits results in a discovery of an elaborate tube system that leads all the way to Largest Ever and to two industrious hamsters.

6.title: Tongue Tied
6.plot: Word gets out to the Downtown City pet population that Blythe can understand them and one morning the pet shop is besieged by those seeking her advice, including one little ferret that has Blythe doubting her abilities.

7.title: What's So Scary About the Jungle? Everything!
7.plot: Ms Twombly's friend a zoologist is visiting the pet shop.And Penny Ling wants to show the zoologist what makes her special,a hug.But things doesn't go as Penny Ling expected which hurts her feelings.

8.title: Two Pets for Two Pests
8.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

9.title: Feud for Thought
9.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

10.title: Fish Out of Water
10.plot: Blythe follows Josh around at his job at Latgeat Ever Pet Shop. The pets try to rescue Goldy the goldfish from the sewers.

11.title: If the Shoe Fits
11.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

12.title: The Very Littlest Pet Shop
12.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

13.title: The Secret Recipe
13.plot: Blythe lives in the big city, right above the Littlest Pet Shop, a day-camp for all types of pets. When she discovers she can talk to the animals, it's the beginning of music-filled, zany adventures with her new four-legged friends.

14.title: Winter Wonder Wha...?
14.plot: Blythe and Zoe are accidentally whisked away for a weekend at the Biskits winter chateau; meanwhile the pets are busy cheering up a visiting homesick penguin.

15.title: Snow Stormin'
15.plot: A massive snow storm hits Downtown City trapping Blythe and the pets at Littlest Pet Shop.

16.title: Back Window
16.plot: When Russell sprains some quills and ends up in a traction ball, he finds himself with nothing to do but stare out the back window where he is certain he catches Josh Sharp stealing Blythe's discarded design sketches from the recycling bin.

17.title: Room Enough
17.plot: A kitten visitor to the day camp peppers the pets with a stream of neverending "Why's" while Blythe wonders the same thing about her frilly bedroom after she sees an article in a magazine about the latest trends in teen bedrooms.

18.title: Why Can't We Be Friends?
18.plot: Blythe hits it off with a fashion-minded girl at a thrift shop and neglects her 'old friends' while Vinnie befriends a genial spider but must hide him from arachnophobic Sunil.

19.title: Pet Sounds
19.plot: Blythe and the pets must help Minka's cousin Cheep-Cheep, who mistakenly thinks his scientist owner has invented a helmet that allows pets to talk to humans.

20.title: The Sister Story
20.plot: When Roger's super competitive sister, Mo, comes for a visit, their need to constantly one-up each other gets out of control.

21.title: A Night at the Pawza
21.plot: Blythe and Mrs. Twombly help a friend try to transform her rundown pet hotel into a showplace, while Fisher Biskit is determined to shut the place down.

22.title: Proud as a... Peacock?
22.plot: The pets try to help a painfully shy peacock get ready for his big debut at the botanical gardens while Youngmee tries to convince Blythe to use her ability to communicate with pets for the betterment of humanity.

23.title: Sue Syndrome
23.plot: Blythe and friends try to help Sue overcome her reluctance to accept an award in front of the whole school while the pets delight in a sweet-smelling skunk day camper much to Pepper's dismay.

24.title: In the Loop
24.plot: When an obnoxious groundhog named Harold arrives at the day camp, Russell can't wait for the day to end, but is horrified to discover that...it never really does.

25.title: It's the Pet Fest! - Part 1
25.plot: After meeting a special new day camper, Blythe's dream of holding a Pet Fest in Downtown City--complete with the Soul Patches as headliners--is about to become a reality, but she has precious little time to pull it together.

26.title: It's the Pet Fest! - Part 2
26.plot: When the outdoor venue for the Pet Fest venue falls through, Blythe only has only mere hours to relocate the entire event and Zoe worries about impressing her new friend, Heidi.

imdb.title: Littlest Pet Shop
plot: A young girl named Blythe Baxter moves to downtown city in an apartment above _Littlest Pet Shop_ (qv). She soon discovers she can understand animals. She goes on some crazy adventures with the pets.
